attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for anyone travelling more than 10 miles a day to go to work.  Fuel is costing ordinary householders a good proportion of their salary, in many cases hundreds of pounds a month.  Indeed some people probably have to choose between eating or going to work.  However I expect that MPs can claim their fuel on expenses, and therefore have no idea of how hard it hits the normal people of Britain who do not have this advantage. They have to pay for their own and MPs to.
